title: How to Make Apple Torte

steps.headline: Pre-heat your oven to 340 degrees F or 170 degrees C.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/c6\/Apple_torte_1_463.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/c\/c6\/Apple_torte_1_463.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":340,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":562.4,"licensing":"

steps.description: Mix the sugar and one of the eggs in a mixer. Beat on a high speed so that the egg mixes in thoroughly. Add the other eggs into the mixer, one by one.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/74\/Apple_torte_2_149.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/7\/74\/Apple_torte_2_149.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":340,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":562.4,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p><\/div>"}
steps.description: Drizzle the melted butter into the mixer and then reduce the speed. Slowly mix in the flour until it's combined.

steps.headline: Add the other liquids to the mixer.
steps.description: Pour in the vanilla essence, milk, and lemon zest. Have those ingredients mix thoroughly and then turn off the mixer.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/fc\/Apple_torte_4_954.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/f\/fc\/Apple_torte_4_954.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":340,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":562.4,"licensing":"

steps.description: Fold the apples into the batter. Add the rum-soaked raisins in the bowl as well.

steps.headline:
{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/52\/Apple_torte_5_337.PNG","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/52\/Apple_torte_5_337.PNG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":343,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":567.4666666666667,"licensing":"

steps.description: Pour the batter into a baking tin and bake for 50 to 55 minutes.
